page.title: 16Clubs in Barrhead
page.content: We have many{clubs}in our town and they cater for all age groups.Some are run by churches,some by local business men and others by groups of local people. Most of the churches have brownies and guides for{girls}and cub scouts, scouts and boys'brigade for{boys. The under fives are catered for by a Tufty club and three play groups. { The Rotary Club and the Round Table are run by local business men. These raise funds for local charities and pensioners in the area. { Lunch clubs}are available for the elderly.These clubs also provide facilities for art&crafts,carpet bowls and sequence dancing.Outings,concerts and group holidays are also arranged.
